Name: SHOOT THE BUUUUUUUGS
About the game: BUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUGS SHOOT THE BUUUUUUUUUUGS - is hardcore arena survival game, collect crystals, kill bugs and have REAL FUN - Endless bugs spawn - Collecting crystals - Nice soundtrack - AK 47 - Beautiful graphic In the near future, you landed on another planet, but the landing was fatal. The only thing you saw was a small ruined settlement and a cemetery. There is no one left here, this is not a planet for people, this is a planet of BUGS. It's good that you have your kind Kalashnikov assault rifle - AK47 with you. Now you must try to survive until reinforcements, and collect as many crystals as possible for the further survival of your civilization. Can you - Unknown Player survive and save the human race? This we will find out in the second part of the arena survival adventure game SHOOT THE BUUUUUUUUUUGS 2. BUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUGS
